item.title: 埃克森公司与韩国 SK On 公司签署非约束性锂供应协议
item.description: 美国能源巨头埃克森美孚（Exxon Mobil）周二表示，该公司已经签署了一份非约束性协议，将向韩国电动汽车电池制造商SK On供应阿肯色州项目中的锂。【原文：U.S. energy major Exxon Mobil said on Tuesday it had signed a non-binding agreement to supply lithium from its proposed Arkansas project to South Korean EV battery maker SK On.】

item.title: 美国法官驳回威士卡和万事达卡 300 亿美元刷卡费和解协议
item.description: 威士公司和万事达公司同意限制向接受其信用卡和借记卡的商家收取的费用。【原文：A U.S. judge on Tuesday rejected a $30 billion antitrust settlement in which Visa and Mastercard agreed to limit fees they charge merchants who accept their credit and debit cards.】

item.title: 美国 6 月消费者信心指数略有下降
item.description: 周二的一项调查显示，由于对经济前景的担忧，6月份美国消费者信心略有下降，但家庭对劳动力市场持乐观态度，对未来一年的通胀预期也略有改善。【原文：U.S. consumer confidence eased slightly in June amid worries about the economic outlook, but households were upbeat about the labor market and their inflation expectations over the next year improved a bit, a survey showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际特赦组织称，Shein 的潜在 IPO 将成为伦敦政治经济学院的 "耻辱徽章
item.description: 大赦国际英国分部周二表示，Shein 可能在伦敦进行首次公开募股将成为伦敦证券交易所的 "耻辱徽章"，因为这家快速时尚公司的劳工和人权标准 "值得怀疑"。【原文：Amnesty International UK said on Tuesday Shein's potential London initial public offering would be a "badge of shame" for the London Stock Exchange because of the fast-fashion firm's "questionable" labour and human rights standards.】

item.title: 报告称大选的不确定性可能影响美国汽车业
item.description: 考克斯汽车公司（Cox Automotive）周二发布的一份报告显示，11月份的总统大选将重塑经济、影响利率或通胀水平的预期加剧了美国汽车业的不确定性。【原文：Uncertainty looms over the U.S. auto industry, fueled by expectations that the presidential elections in November will reshape the economy, affect interest rates or influence inflation levels, a report from Cox Automotive showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 数据显示，英伟达做空者从三天抛售中获利 50 亿美元
item.description: 据数据分析公司Ortex Technologies称，过去三个交易日，英伟达（Nvidia）做空者从这家人工智能芯片设计公司的大幅下挫中获得了近50亿美元的纸面利润。【原文：Nvidia short sellers have raked in nearly $5 billion in paper profits from the AI chip designer's sharp selloff over the past three sessions, according to data analytics firm Ortex Technologies.】

item.title: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司加快中国比亚迪的销售步伐
item.description: 沃伦-巴菲特（Warren Buffett）的伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）已加快出售中国最大的电动汽车销售商比亚迪的股票。【原文：Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway has accelerated its selling of shares in BYD , China's largest seller of electric vehicles.】

item.title: 邮轮需求稳定，嘉年华公司再次上调年度盈利预期
item.description: 嘉年华集团（Carnival Corp）周二上调了年度利润预期，这是今年以来第二次上调预期，原因是其航线价格上涨，加勒比海和阿拉斯加等目的地的游轮假期需求持续。【原文：Carnival Corp , raised its annual profit forecast on Tuesday for the second time this year, banking on higher prices for its itineraries and sustained demand for cruise holidays to destinations such as the Caribbean and Alaska.】

item.title: 法兰克福摩天大楼业主申请破产，地产危机笼罩全球
item.description: 德国银行业之都法兰克福一幢著名摩天大楼的业主已申请破产，德国正在经历一代人以来最大的房地产危机。【原文：The owner of a prominent skyscraper in Germany's banking capital of Frankfurt has filed for insolvency, as the country reels from its biggest property crisis in a generation.】

item.title: 美国 4 月房价稳步上涨 -FHFA
item.description: 4 月份，美国独户住宅价格稳步上涨，但由于借贷成本上升抑制了住房需求，导致供应增加，因此上涨势头可能放缓。【原文：U.S. single-family home prices increased at a steady clip in April, but momentum could slow as higher borrowing costs weigh on demand for housing, contributing to a rise in supply.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，路威酩轩集团首席执行官阿尔诺持有奢侈品竞争对手历峰集团的股份
item.description: 据彭博社周二报道，欧洲首富、高级时装和香槟集团路威酩轩集团（LVMH）董事长、法国亿万富翁伯纳德-阿诺特（Bernard Arnault）收购了规模较小的奢侈品竞争对手历峰集团（Richemont）的股份。【原文：French billionaire Bernard Arnault, Europe's richest man and the chairman of high fashion to champagne group LVMH , has bought a stake in smaller luxury rival Richemont , Bloomberg reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 如果政府支持的贷款不能延期，越南国旗航空公司将面临破产风险
item.description: 越南政府周二表示，如果越南国家航空公司越南航空股份公司（Vietnam Airlines JSC）政府支持贷款的再融资还款期限不能延长，该公司最早将在 7 月份面临失去流动资金的风险。【原文：National carrier Vietnam Airlines JSC is facing the risk of losing liquidity as early as July if the refinancing loan repayment deadline for its government-backed loan is not extended, the government said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 专注于人工智能的制造初创企业从英伟达等公司融资 1.06 亿美元
item.description: 软件和机器人初创公司 Bright Machines 周二表示，该公司在 C 轮融资中筹集了 1.06 亿美元，投资方包括英伟达（Nvidia）和微软。【原文：Software and robotics startup Bright Machines raised $106 million in a Series C funding round that included Nvidia and Microsoft as investors, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 发动机制造商的波音困境助推空客产量计划停滞不前
item.description: 业内人士周二表示，发动机制造商CFM公司不愿在其另一主要客户波音公司面临压力之际大幅增加对空客的供应，这可能是空客推迟喷气机增产计划的一个因素。【原文：Engine maker CFM's wariness to ramp up supplies significantly to Airbus at a time of stress for its other key customer Boeing was likely a factor in Airbus' move to delay planned jet output increases, industry sources said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 中国副部长：中国欢迎美国乳品企业在华扩张
item.description: 中国商务部副部长王受文周二表示，中国欢迎包括美国在内的各国乳品企业拓展中国市场。【原文：China welcomes dairy companies from all countries, including the U.S., to expand their business in the Chinese market, Vice Minister of Commerce Wang Shouwen said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 人工智能初创公司 Etched 融资 1.2 亿美元开发专用芯片
item.description: 人工智能初创公司 Etched 周二表示，该公司已在 A 轮融资中筹集到 1.2 亿美元，计划用于进一步开发其专用芯片。【原文：Artificial-intelligence startup Etched said on Tuesday it has raised $120 million in a series-A funding round that the company plans to use to further develop its specialized chip.】

item.title: 美联储鲍曼："一段时间内 "需要稳定的政策利率来战胜通胀
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会理事米歇尔-鲍曼周二重申了她的观点，即在 "一段时间内 "保持政策利率稳定可能就足以控制通胀，但她也再次表示愿意在必要时提高借贷成本。【原文：U.S. Federal Reserve Governor Michelle Bowman on Tuesday reiterated her view that holding the policy rate steady "for some time" will likely be enough to bring inflation under control, but also repeated her willingness to raise borrowing costs if needed.】

item.title: 纳斯达克期货上涨，英伟达在人工智能股溃败后企稳
item.description: 纳斯达克期货周二攀升，原因是英伟达（Nvidia）和其他与人工智能相关的股票在遭遇重挫后走强，而投资者则在等待美国联邦储备委员会官员本周讲话提供的有关货币政策路径的进一步线索。【原文：Nasdaq futures climbed on Tuesday as Nvidia and other AI-linked stocks firmed after a bruising selloff, while investors awaited further cues on the monetary policy path based on remarks by U.S. Federal Reserve officials this week.】

item.title: 日经》报道：日产将于年底前开始为东风汽车生产电动汽车
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，日产汽车将于今年年底前在其武汉工厂为中国东风汽车生产电动汽车（EV）。【原文：Nissan Motor will produce electric vehicles (EVs) for China's Dongfeng Motor at its Wuhan factory by the end of the year, the Nikkei newspaper reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特拉华州法律允许大投资者对美国公司董事会施加更大影响
item.description: 特拉华州准备对其广泛使用的公司法进行修改，批评者认为这可能会削弱美国的董事会，有利于私人股权公司等有影响力的投资者。【原文：Delaware is poised to adopt changes to its widely used corporate law that critics argue could weaken U.S. boards of directors in favor of influential investors such as private-equity firms.】

item.title: FTX 寻求债权人就破产清算付款进行投票
item.description: FTX 周二将请求法官允许破产的加密货币交易所的客户就清算计划进行投票，该计划将以现金形式偿还客户，但遭到了一些客户的反对，他们要求更高的还款额。【原文：FTX on Tuesday will ask a judge to allow customers of the bankrupt crypto exchange to vote on a liquidation plan that would pay them back in cash, over the objections of some customers who have demanded higher repayments.】

item.title: 早间竞购英伟达的半万亿美元小插曲；比特币和中国经济下滑
item.description: Mike Dolan 展望美国和全球市场的未来一天【原文：A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan】

item.title: 欧盟指控微软滥用将 Teams 与 Office 捆绑的做法
item.description: 欧盟反垄断监管机构周二指控微软将其聊天和视频应用程序 Teams 与 Office 产品非法捆绑在一起，并称这家美国科技巨头最近采取的松绑措施还不够，还需要做更多的工作。【原文：EU antitrust regulators on Tuesday charged Microsoft of illegally bundling its chat and video app Teams with its Office product and say that recent moves by the U.S. tech giant to unbundle the package were insufficient and more needed to be done.】

item.title: 汉莎航空提高票价以满足环保要求
item.description: 汉莎航空公司（Lufthansa）周二表示，由于环境成本上升，从欧盟国家、英国、挪威和瑞士出发的所有航班的票价将上调1欧元至72欧元（1.07美元至77.24美元）不等。【原文：Lufthansa will increase ticket prices on all flights departing from EU countries, Britain, Norway and Switzerland by between 1 euro and 72 euros($1.07-$77.24) as environmental costs rise, the company said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国安全监管机构称福特将召回超过 55 万辆汽车
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）周二表示，福特汽车公司将在美国召回 552,188 辆 2014 款 F-150 汽车，原因是该问题可能导致汽车意外降档至一档。【原文：Ford Motor is recalling 552,188 of its 2014 F-150 vehicles in the U.S., due to an issue which may lead the vehicle to unexpectedly downshift into the first gear, the National Highway Traffic Safety Administration said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 特斯拉因挡风玻璃雨刮器和外饰问题召回数千辆 Cybertrucks
item.description: 美国国家公路交通安全管理局（NHTSA）表示，特斯拉正在召回 11,688 辆 Cybertruck 电动皮卡车，因为挡风玻璃雨刷器故障可能会降低能见度，增加车祸风险。【原文：Tesla is recalling 11,688 Cybertruck electric pickup trucks as a failure of the windshield wiper could reduce visibility, increasing the risk of a crash, the U.S. National Highway Traffic Safety Administration (NHTSA) said.】

item.title: 迪拜将投资 82 亿美元加强雨水排放系统
item.description: 迪拜将斥资 300 亿迪拉姆（约合 82 亿美元）加强雨水排放系统，因为这座海湾城市在 4 月份遭遇了阿联酋 75 年来最猛烈的暴雨袭击。【原文：Dubai will spend 30 billion dirhams ($8.2 billion) to boost its rainwater drainage system after the Gulf city was hit by the heaviest downpours recorded in the UAE in 75 years in April.】

item.title: 美元主导地位稳固，金砖五国认为去美元化未取得进展--报道
item.description: 大西洋理事会地缘经济中心（Atlantic Council's GeoEconomics Center）的一项新研究显示，美元仍是世界主要储备货币，欧元和所谓的金砖国家都未能减少全球对美元的依赖。【原文：The U.S. dollar remains the world's primary reserve currency, and neither the euro nor the so-called BRICS countries have been able to reduce global reliance on the dollar, a new study by the Atlantic Council's GeoEconomics Center shows.】

item.title: 埃克森领导的圭亚那石油集团 2023 年净利润跃升，利润率居 Nvidia 之首
item.description: 政府数据显示，圭亚那去年与埃克森美孚为首的财团在南美国家签署的协议利润丰厚，为合作伙伴带来了 63.3 亿美元的收益，其净利润率超过了芯片制造商英伟达公司。【原文：Guyana's lucrative agreement with an Exxon Mobil-led consortium in the South American country last year generated $6.33 billion for the partners, government data showed, yielding a net margin larger than that of chip-maker Nvidia Corp.】

item.title: 中国敦促欧盟撤销对与俄罗斯有关联的中国企业的制裁
item.description: 中国周二敦促欧盟撤销对中国公司的制裁，因为欧盟认为中国公司支持了俄罗斯在乌克兰的战争。【原文：China on Tuesday urged the European Union to revoke sanctions on Chinese companies for what it believes is supporting Russia's war in Ukraine.】
